price: “Slavljen i uzvišen je Gospodar naš!”, rekoše, “mi smo, uistinu, nepravedni bili!”
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
